description: Keil uVision Assistant is convenient for working with uVision projects, but does not change the principle project file configuration, and common functions include writing code, compiling, recompiling, downloading and other functions
keil-assistant.contributes.conf.title: Keil Assistant
keil-assistant.contributes.conf.props.md: Keil (MDK/C51/C251 All in one) Installation directory, must not empty ; default: C:\Keil_v5
keil-assistant.contributes.conf.props.pr: uVision project file name exclude list

uVision project file custom include paths; Use relative paths, like: 

../lib/inc,

../common/inc

keil-assistant.contributes.conf.props.ke.message:
Keil uVision (MDK/C51/C251) Installation directory, Please modify the default value according to the actual installation directory, if (MDK/C51/C251) is installed in the same directory, you can set the MDK installation directory separately. 
 Default value: {"MDK":"C:\Keil_v5"}ã€‚

Example:

"{"MDK":"C:\Keil_v5"}"

"{"C51":"C:\Keil_v5"}"

"{"C251":"C:\Keil_v5"}"
comment: Markdown text between `` should not be translated or localized (they represent literal text) and the capitalization, spacing, and punctuation (including the ``) should not be altered.
